cumulative_requirements.label: Spend
cumulative_requirements.description: FastSaver & Visa Signature (min. S$300* card spend per statement month) & Insurance

requirements.label: Spend
requirements.description: Visa Signature (min. S$300* card spend per statement month)
conditions: Hold Qualifying Account(s) and CIMB Visa Signature Principal Credit Card during the Promotion Period; AND

Meet a minimum spend of S$300 posted within the same statement month on their CIMB Visa Signature Credit Card from June 2022 statement month onwards on their CIMB Visa Signature Credit Card. Exclusions apply to minimum spend.

Refunded retail transactions will be deducted from the relevant monthly billed amount for the computation of the minimum spend of S$300 posted within the same statement month and awarding of Bonus Interest/Profit rate.

requirements.label: Invest
conditions: The Promotion is available from 1 May 2022 to 30 April 2023 ('Promotion Period'), both dates inclusive.
Any Unit Trust purchase (Cash or SRS only) with minimum investment amount S$10,000 (Sales charge at least 2%).
Bonus Interest/Profit Rate will start accruing from settlement date to the end of the Promotion Period.
For any joint purchase for any Investments or Insurance products, Bonus Interest/Profit Rate will only credited into the main applicant’s Qualifying Account.

requirements.label: Invest
conditions: The Promotion is available from 1 May 2022 to 30 April 2023 ('Promotion Period'), both dates inclusive.
Any Structured Deposit purchase with minimum investment amount S$50,000.
Bonus Interest/Profit Rate will start accruing from settlement date to the end of the Promotion Period.
For any joint purchase for any Investments or Insurance products, Bonus Interest/Profit Rate will only credited into the main applicant’s Qualifying Account.

requirements.label: Invest
conditions: The Promotion is available from 1 May 2022 to 30 April 2023 ('Promotion Period'), both dates inclusive.
Any Dual Currency Investment purchase with minimum investment amount S$50,000.
Bonus Interest/Profit Rate will start accruing from settlement date to the end of the Promotion Period.
For any joint purchase for any Investments or Insurance products, Bonus Interest/Profit Rate will only credited into the main applicant’s Qualifying Account.

requirements.label: Insure
conditions: The Promotion is available from 1 May 2022 to 30 April 2023 ('Promotion Period'), both dates inclusive.
Any life insurance purchase with minimum S$50,000 in Single Premium (SP).
Bonus Interest/Profit Rate will start accruing from inception date to the end of the Promotion Period.
For any joint purchase for any Investments or Insurance products, Bonus Interest/Profit Rate will only credited into the main applicant’s Qualifying Account.

requirements.label: Insure
conditions: The Promotion is available from 1 May 2022 to 30 April 2023 ('Promotion Period'), both dates inclusive.
Any life insurance purchase with minimum S$2,000 in Annual Regular Premium (RP).
Bonus Interest/Profit Rate will start accruing from inception date to the end of the Promotion Period.
For any joint purchase for any Investments or Insurance products, Bonus Interest/Profit Rate will only credited into the main applicant’s Qualifying Account.
